Articles.Content:
Preamble: So for a while I've been using sunnypunny's TechTreeTweaks as my tech tree mod of choice, but they appear to have destroyed any instances of that mod from the open web within the past day and if someone's going to go to that extent to make their work unusable then I don't want to use it. 

Now, the question, here, as per the topic title, is that I'm trying to decide on a mod for the stock tech tree that's a) coherently designed b) balanced for the stock parts and c) balanced for unlocking one node at a time.

Honestly considering making my own at this point.
I recommend UnkerballedStart or ProbesBeforeCrew. They change the tech tree to use probes, um, before crew. Hopefully these work for you.

2 hours ago, Watermel00n said:

I recommend UnkerballedStart or ProbesBeforeCrew. They change the tech tree to use probes, um, before crew. Hopefully these work for you.

Unfortunately I've already ruled these out due to them being designed in terms of the Community Tech Tree rather than the stock parts.
